

libogg downloaded from: https://www.xiph.org/downloads/
version 1.3.2

Modifications - Aaron - May 9:

1 - Stripped out everything but the src/ and include/ dirs
2 - Added libVorbis (1.3.5) from same site, unpacking to this directory
3 - Created CMake to build OGG and Vorbis (as simply one ogg.a library)
